page.title: 08COEDPOETH-EMPLOYMENT/HOUSING
page.content: {Coedpoeth}is a rapidly expanding village with many new houses being built within its boundaries.These tend to be either semi-detached or detached houses built as small estates of approximately twenty houses.The market price tending to be in the region of Â£18,000 to Â£28,000. { {EMPLOYMENT} Although the majority of people living in Coedpoeth work outside the village, (for example in Wrexham,Chester,Liverpool,etc.), there is local industry which has recently moved into the area and has provided work for some of the inhabitants,such industries comprise of bakeries,firms of small building contractors and some light industry near Minera.
